body: Your command over shadow and darkness create longer-lasting spell effects.
name: Shadow Caster
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Drow/New Racial Rules/Drow Feats/Shadow Caster

sections.body: When you cast spells of the shadow subschool or spells with the darkness descriptor, you are considered two levels higher when determining the duration of those spells.
sections.name: Benefit
